tasks.goalExpressionTex: \frac{sin\left(2 \cdot x\right) - cos\left(2 \cdot x\right)}{sin\left(2 \cdot x\right) + cos\left(2 \cdot x\right)}

tasks.originalExpressionTex: {\left(sin\left(\frac{3 \cdot pi}{10}\right) \cdot cos\left(\frac{2 \cdot pi}{5}\right) + cos\left(\frac{3 \cdot pi}{10}\right) \cdot sin\left(\frac{2 \cdot pi}{5}\right)\right)^{2}} + {\left(cos\left(\frac{pi}{10}\right) \cdot cos\left(\frac{3 \cdot pi}{5}\right) - sin\left(\frac{pi}{10}\right) \cdot sin\left(\frac{3 \cdot pi}{5}\right)\right)^{2}}

originalExpression.expression: {\left(sin\left(\frac{3 \cdot pi}{10}\right) \cdot cos\left(\frac{2 \cdot pi}{5}\right) + cos\left(\frac{3 \cdot pi}{10}\right) \cdot sin\left(\frac{2 \cdot pi}{5}\right)\right)^{2}} + {\left(cos\left(\frac{pi}{10}\right) \cdot cos\left(\frac{3 \cdot pi}{5}\right) - sin\left(\frac{pi}{10}\right) \cdot sin\left(\frac{3 \cdot pi}{5}\right)\right)^{2}}
